item.description:

Here is the first 17 lines of my client.java

import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.text.*;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {


public int arrowattack = 0;
public boolean dlongDMG = false;
public boolean Dlong = false;
public void DragonLongSpecial()
public boolean SpecAtk2DMG = false;
public void SpecAtk2Special()

Here is the error itself, simple I know =(

client.java:16: ';' expected

^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Please help I really want my double dds hit to work
